products.title: Boots and Hearts 2016
products.description: A vibrant country music festival featuring top international and Indian artists, bringing together music lovers for a weekend of unforgettable performances under the stars.

products.title: BottleRock Napa Valley
products.description: An eclectic mix of rock, indie, and electronic music paired with gourmet food and fine wines in India's tech capital's premier outdoor venue.

products.title: Summer Beats Festival
products.description: Three days of non-stop electronic dance music on Goa's famous beaches, featuring world-class DJs and breathtaking sunset parties.

products.title: Electric Daisy Carnival
products.description: India's largest EDM festival transforms Delhi into a neon wonderland with massive stages, carnival rides, and immersive art installations.

products.title: Sunset Music Fest
products.description: An intimate festival celebrating diverse musical genres against the backdrop of Hyderabad's iconic monuments as the sun sets.

products.title: Firefly Festival
products.description: A magical camping festival in the Western Ghats featuring indie bands, bonfire jams, and nature activities under a sky full of stars.

products.title: Winter Jam Tour
products.description: South India's premier winter music festival showcasing a blend of classical fusion and contemporary artists on Chennai's scenic beaches.

products.title: SoulFest
products.description: A celebration of soul, jazz, and blues in the cultural capital of India, featuring legendary musicians and emerging talents.

products.title: Desert Daze
products.description: An unforgettable musical experience in the golden Thar Desert, combining folk traditions with psychedelic rock under moonlit dunes.

products.title: Global Groove
products.description: Northeast India's premier world music festival celebrating indigenous sounds alongside global rhythms in the picturesque Khasi Hills.

products.title: Tech World 2024
products.description: India's largest tech conference showcasing cutting-edge innovations, with keynote speakers from global tech giants and startup disruptors.

products.title: AI & Future Summit
products.description: Exploring the frontiers of artificial intelligence with leading researchers and industry pioneers shaping India's technological future.

products.title: Blockchain Conf 2024
products.description: The definitive conference on blockchain technology, cryptocurrency trends, and decentralized finance in India's financial capital.

products.title: Design Matters
products.description: A gathering of India's most creative minds in UX, product design, and visual communication, hosted at the country's design capital.

products.title: Startup Grind Global
products.description: Connecting India's most promising startups with investors and mentors in the heart of the Delhi-NCR startup ecosystem.

products.title: Web Dev Conference
products.description: Hands-on workshops and sessions on the latest web technologies, frameworks, and best practices for modern developers.

products.title: Cloud Connect
products.description: South India's premier cloud computing event featuring case studies from enterprises successfully transitioning to cloud infrastructure.

products.title: CyberSec World
products.description: Critical discussions on cybersecurity threats, defense strategies, and policy frameworks with India's top security experts.

products.title: Open Source Days
products.description: Celebrating India's vibrant open-source community with coding sprints, project showcases, and collaborative development sessions.

products.title: GreenTech Innovation
products.description: Showcasing sustainable technology solutions for urban development in India's first planned eco-friendly city.

products.title: Kids Carnival Fun
products.description: A colorful carnival with rides, games, and creative workshops designed to spark joy and imagination in children of all ages.

products.title: Backyard Science Fair
products.description: Interactive science experiments and DIY projects that make learning fun for curious young minds in a safe outdoor environment.

products.title: Art in the Park
products.description: Children explore various art mediums through guided activities in beautiful park settings, fostering creativity and nature appreciation.

products.title: Lego Building Challenge
products.description: Team-based Lego competitions where kids solve engineering challenges and build imaginative structures with thousands of bricks.

products.title: Storytelling Circle
products.description: Professional storytellers bring folktales and modern stories to life through interactive performances and creative dramatics.

products.title: Junior Robotics Day
products.description: Hands-on robotics workshops where children build and program simple robots while learning basic engineering concepts.

products.title: Mini Sports League
products.description: Friendly sports tournaments introducing kids to various games while emphasizing teamwork, fair play, and healthy competition.

products.title: Petting Zoo Day
products.description: Children interact with friendly farm animals while learning about animal care and biodiversity in a safe, supervised environment.

products.title: Outdoor Puzzle Quest
products.description: An exciting treasure hunt with physical and mental challenges that encourage problem-solving and teamwork in beautiful outdoor settings.

products.title: Junior Gardening Workshop
products.description: Kids get their hands dirty while learning to plant seeds, care for plants, and understand ecosystems in this nature-immersion program.
